a0.speaker: Youmu:
a0.dialogue: It's dangerous to go alone, mate! Take your weapon and fight against whoever's lurking in that 'Labyrinth'!

a1.speaker: Raiko:
a1.dialogue: Who cares? My cousin is already out in order to find out about the truth of the Labyrinth of Mirrors!

a2.speaker: Youmu:
a2.dialogue: Well, you said that if she failed her mission, you can count on ME!

a3.speaker: Raiko:
a3.dialogue: I am very sure that she shall succeed on her mission.

a4.speaker: Raiko:
a4.dialogue: Whatever fool behind the scheme is just an angel, or a henchman of one.
